body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play a Reaper from the Abyss
2. Play at least two non-Demon creatures
3. While the AI has no creatures in play, kill one of those two creatures. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The Reaper's morbid trigger is mandatory, so it should kill the other creature. Instead the trigger appears on the stack but does nothing. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.23, OS X
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Reaper from the Abyss doesn't kill your own creatures
